00019 bool PackMaker2FrmApp::OnInit()
00020 {
00021     bool RetVal = false;
00022     //First parse the command line
00023     static const wxCmdLineEntryDesc cmdLineDesc[] =
00024     {
00025         { wxCMD_LINE_SWITCH, "h", "help",       "Show help info" },
00026         { wxCMD_LINE_SWITCH, "s", "silent",     "Don't show a GUI" },
00027 
00028         { wxCMD_LINE_OPTION, "o", "output",     "Output file" },
00029         { wxCMD_LINE_OPTION, "i", "input",      "Input file" },
00030 
00031         { wxCMD_LINE_NONE }
00032     };
00033 
00034     wxCmdLineParser parser(argc,argv);
00035 
00036     parser.SetDesc(cmdLineDesc);
00037     
00038     //If we have any options specified then use those
00039     //If -H is specified then show help message and quit
00040     //If -S is specified then don't show any forms
00041     //If -I:<Filename> is specified then use this as the package name
00042     //If -O:<Filename> is specified then use this as the output filename
00043     int result = parser.Parse();
00044     wxString InputFile, OutputFile;
00045     bool SilentMode = false;
00046     switch(result)
00047     {
00048         case -1:
00049             parser.Usage();
00050             break;
00051         case 0:
00052             {
00053                 if(parser.Found(wxT("h")))
00054                 {
00055                     parser.Usage();
00056                 }
00057                 else
00058                 {
00059                     SilentMode = parser.Found(wxT("s"));
00060                     PackMaker2Frm* frame = new PackMaker2Frm(NULL);
00061                     //Check to see if we have input or output files
00062                     //if so set these in the main frame
00063                     if(parser.Found(wxT("i"),&InputFile))
00064                     {
00065                         if(parser.Found(wxT("o"),&OutputFile));
00066                     }
00067                     //If not silent mode
00068                     if(!SilentMode)
00069                     {
00070                         bool ValidFile = false;
00071                         //check to see if we have an input file
00072                         if(!InputFile.IsEmpty())
00073                         {
00074                             ValidFile = wxFileExists(InputFile);
00075                             if(ValidFile)
00076                             {
00077                                 frame->SetFileName(InputFile);
00078                                 SetTopWindow(frame);
00079                                 frame->Show();
00080                                 RetVal = true;
00081                             }
00082                         }
00083                         if(InputFile.IsEmpty()||ValidFile == false)
00084                         {        
00085                             //If not show the action dialog
00086                             ActionDlg TempActionDlg(NULL);
00087                             int DlgRetVal = TempActionDlg.ShowModal();
00088                             if(DlgRetVal != wxID_CANCEL)
00089                             {
00090                                 SetTopWindow(frame);
00091                                 if(DlgRetVal == CREATE_PACKAGE)
00092                                     frame->CreateNewFile();
00093                                 else
00094                                     frame->OpenItemClick();
00095                                 frame->Show();
00096                                 RetVal = true;
00097                             }
00098                         }
00099                     }
00100                     else
00101                     {
00102                         //Check to see if we have an input file
00103                         //If not we cannot proceed in silent mode
00104                         if(!InputFile.IsEmpty())
00105                         {
00106                             frame->SetFileName(InputFile);
00107                             if(!OutputFile.IsEmpty())
00108                             {
00109                                 frame->SetOutputFileName(OutputFile);
00110                             }
00111                             frame->BuildPackage();
00112                         }
00113                         //Destroy the frame
00114                         frame->Destroy();   
00115                         //Signal the end of the application
00116                         RetVal = false;
00117                     }
00118                 }
00119             }
00120             break;
00121         default:
00122             //Error processing commandline
00123             break;
00124     };
00125             
00126     // If none of these are specified then open the Action Dialog
00127     
00128     //First check to see if we have an existing INI file
00129     //If not display a dialog asking if we want to start in wizard mode
00130     //If answer is yes display wizard
00131     //If no start in frame mode
00132     /*ActionDlg TempActionDlg(NULL);
00133     int DlgRetVal = TempActionDlg.ShowModal();
00134     if(DlgRetVal != wxID_CANCEL)
00135     {
00136         PackMaker2Frm* frame = new PackMaker2Frm(NULL);
00137         SetTopWindow(frame);
00138         if(DlgRetVal == CREATE_PACKAGE)
00139             frame->CreateNewFile();
00140         else
00141             frame->OpenItemClick();
00142         frame->Show();
00143         RetVal = true;
00144     }*/
00145     return RetVal;
00146 }
